뉴비컷이 높지만 감안하고 할만큼 재밌는 비대칭 술래잡기 게임입니다. 업뎃도 꾸준하고 살인마와 맵, 생존자와 퍽도 다양해서 재밌습니다. 
 다만 최적화가 너무 안좋고 패치를 할 때마다 다양한 버그들이 생기며 심지어 치명적이기도 합니다. 살인마들은 뚜벅이와 너스블로 나뉠정도로 살인마별 포텐셜이 크게 차이납니다.

 감안하고 할 만큼 재밌는 게임이긴하지만 시작하기전에 알고계시면 좋습니다!

If all parties are good sports and don't use most overpowered/unfair add-ons, perks or playstyle, the game is very fun. But this being a online multiplayer games, people that play fair are few and far between. 

Most killers are very unique in design and gameplay and are fun to go against or play as but be prepared to put in exponentially more hours if you want to master a killer. You won't feel like unstoppable freak of nature with chainsaw or superhuman bioweapon first 100 matches. While all the survivors plays the same and you can get good pretty fast, playing killer is stressful and rough if you are not used to it. You have to juggle between chasing survivors and patrolling generators constantly. For killers with high mobility like the nurse who can blink through walls or the blight who can pinball his way across whole map in seconds, this is no problem but for killers like the pig or the trapper, You WILL have already lost 3 out of 5 gens by the time you get your first hook. The grind to get your favorite perks on the character you want is also horrible but the developers have responded that they are working on reducing it.
